p: We can only pay your State Pension into your personal or joint bank or building society account.

errors.p1: Please check the following problem or problems

paymentMethod.fieldset: How would you like to be paid?
paymentMethod.label-display: How would you like to be paid?

errors.format: Should start with an A-z character, can only contain characters A-z, ampersand, apostrophes, full stops, hyphens and spaces.
Please enter a valid sort code.

buildingRoll.label: Building society roll or reference number
buildingRoll.label-display: If your building society uses a roll or reference number, you need to provide it. You will find it on your passbook.
buildingRoll.hint: If your building society uses a roll or reference number, you need to provide it. You will find it on your passbook.

errors.format: Please note only valid characters are: Alpha, Numeric, Ampersand (&), Apostrophe (') Asterisk (*), Comma (,), Full Stop (.), Hyphen (-), Parentheses (()), Space ( ) and Slash (/).
